title: CDP-based autonomous debug pipeline for Brave
description: Create scripts/debug-brave.sh and scripts/cdp-diagnose.js for agent-driven Brave debugging via Chrome DevTools Protocol. Add diagnose:brave npm script.

title: Draft upstream Chromium feature request for chrome.windows.Window.name
description: Write crbug.com bug report text requesting window name property in chrome.windows API. Fire-and-forget deliverable for user to submit.

title: The window title should be the title of the tab/window. This is not working via this line: 'windowMap[win.id] = win.title || ;'. It always shows the id. Debug and fix
PID-based window filtering in native host
description: Fix Brave-shows-Chrome bug by filtering OS windows to browser process tree via os.getppid(). Modify _get_window_names_linux() to use xdotool getwindowpid for PID filtering and _get_window_names_macos() for CGWindowListCopyWindowInfo PID filtering.

title: add a gitignore for macos and the tools in this project.  Do NOT globally ignore .idea
